name: The Jurassic Adventure(In development)
description:
Hey guys, this is my first prototype game, developing in Construct 3 so if you like it, try to give donations so i can continue the game, 

Don't worry, if you donate, i'll continue developing more level, and making more interesting the story! :D

If you are interested to help me, go ahead!!
Just tell me what you can do and we can talk through email! :)
